documents.document: @astro_timpeake @NASA stayed up late &waved as you drifted overhead. Greetings from Wellington NZ!

Today is the day your life could change! Make God the centre of every decision and live in his overflow :)
@IcarusForde Gmail autcorrects "Kilbirnie" to "chilblains". Go figure!
God wouldn't give us a purpose without making sure of our success so step boldly despite the naysayers! He trusts you so listen to Him!!!
We got to move it move it, MOVE IT!!! Can't wait to move it to Vision Sunday! Are you coming too? It's going to be incredible! #seeyouthere
Leaders must be worth following. Followers are worth treasuring!

You can't judge a person by their exterior. They may not seem much, but in times of sadness, weariness or trouble, they are always there x

@danieltiaiti congratulations! So many will be saved because of your relationship with God!

I suspect today I am renewed. Enjoying the overhaul I get every morning!

Today I surround myself in thoughts about what I want: to be happy and fulfilled in Christ. Speak encouragement, be open, love every1!
What a beautiful day - I'm living in the overflow!!!
@IcarusForde o well that's ok then :) just sounded kinda lonely. I njoy a bit of solitude too. Chatting with the Holy Spirit!
@IcarusForde didn't it give someone the opportunity to bless you with a free coffee?
@IcarusForde In prayer for you dude!
Never believe that others are somehow fundamentally better than you. God made them &you to His plan. Different yes, inferior no #Hiscreation
Finally a day to organize and streamline home and business. Actually looking forward to the work..God's hand is all over this!
@IAmJohnSparks Me! @CeeDub67 thank you and happy new year! !

2014 will be a year of building & growth in my life, spirit, marriage, business & most importantly my relationship with God #declaringit!
Ringing in the New Year watching Bridget Jones' Diary. Great film about fresh starts & coming back after epic fails. Happy New Year to all!
Last night we had Dad teaching his daughter to drive up here, this morning a guy teaching his son to drive a forklift! #ChristmasinthePark
